ygData.subject: Re: ___JBoots___
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/5/99 1:15:21 PM Eastern Daylight Time, DWHITCRAFT@cerner.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/5/99 1:15:21 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
DWHITCRAFT@... writes:

<<
Well, in my opinion, it SHOULD take this long to get these bad boys. I've
played a warrior and a shaman. I KNOW the value of SOW... If everyone had
JBoots, the game would be toast. JBoots are one of the best items in the
game. And, of course, I'm shaded by my Shamanic Opinion....
>>

I totally agree - can you imagine if it was easy for Wizards like me to get J
Boots? We would be the masters of kiting and would still have teleport,
portal, evacuate and gate spells. That would be way unbalanced.

Wizaro Wrathcaster
